Text: RE ISDA Master AgreementHi Marie Our attorney has been on vacation most of this month and unfortunately we have not had the chance to review of your proposed ISDA documents Would it be possible for you to review our docs It will certainly help us out since we currently have a back log of unsigned ISDA contracts Please advise Thanks Angie Original Message From Heard Marie mailtoMarie NRONcom Sent Tuesday August PM To Cc Williams Jason R Credit Subject ISDA Master Agreement Hi Angie I am just writing to check on the status of your review of the draft ISDA Master Agreement I forwarded to you Will you please let me know when you anticipate sending your comments Thanks Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Master Netting Agreement between Enron North America ENA and So CalGas Cc our telephone discussion this morning attached is the file containing the abovereferenced agreement Please review and if it meets with ENAs approval please mail two partially signed agreements to my attention for SoCalGas completion If by chance there are changes to the agreements notices section please let me know and I will send you a revised agreement If you have any questions please give me a call Thanks for your prompt attention ENAMstrNetngAgrmtPDF Angie Garfio Ishikawa Southern California Gas Company Gas Acquisition Tel No Fax No ENAMstrNetngAgrmtPDF
